tasks.JobName: Distribute upsurge reminder letter issued to users via email
Check PPS daily backup, take off the last day offsite tape PPSPRD-L4-GEN4, PPSPRD-R16-GEN4
Perform PPS System Health Check and send comfirmed email to related parties. (https://pps.td.hksarg/pps/)
Check the status of 4 LOs' Health Check Monitoring PC
Download GPMIS file from V5
Upload GFMIS file to Treasury Remarks : Must before 20:00 for Mon - Fri, 14:30 for Sat)
Check VRMS daily backup
Check Daily DB backup on PCC Data Protector Manager DB-VALIDPRO-u5pdb01-FRI   □ DB-VALIDPRO-u5pdb02-FRI   □ Oracle8 VALIDPRO-ONLINE-FRI   □ IDB DP-IDB-FRI   □
Check Daily DB backup on SCC Data Protector Manager DB-VALIDPRO-u5ddb01-FRI   □ DB-NONPRO-u5ddb0a_db0b_FRI   □ Oracle8 NP-U5DDB-ORACLE-FRI   □ IDB SCC-DP-IDB-FRI   □ Time completed at : _____:_____
Check Date of SAV Virus Definitions File for both PCC / SCC VALID V Servers on IE
Retrieve HP-UX server's login audit from syslog and send to related parties
tasks.Remarks: (Remarks :   (After System Deployment if any) Re: Operation Notice 049/11)

tasks.JobName: Replenish blank papers into corresponding printer trays (Replace Toner Cartridge and Maintenance Kit when prompt)
Health check on operation equipment in PCC and SCC, including EMAS, VALID_V UPS, CCTV, WiFi
Copying CMIS report file from m5ppc02 to Q drive
Check: all lasejet print queue in "ready" status □ all line printer print queue in "paused" status □ report generator is ready in m5prpt01 □ DocQueFlow status □
Run SQL "generate_scheduled_task_list" and "generate_failed_running_task_list"
Run SQL "generate_scheduled_task list" report
Prepare USB Drive for Payment Agent Files Download
Download transaction file from HKPost
Daily Batch job started.  Total number of batch job :_________
Download memo and transaction file from ATM
Upload ATM memo  □  and transaction file  □ to VALID V
tasks.Remarks: (Remarks : Must after batch job started and before 00:00)

tasks.JobName: Upload HKPOST transaction file  □ to VALID V
tasks.Remarks: (Remarks : Must after batch job started and before 00:00)

tasks.JobName: Run SQL "generate_payment_agents_success_upload_list" & Backup Payment Agent Files to Network Drive
To ping IP addresses of ITS UPS at TDOA PC
Download file from Judiciary CASEMAN's Passive Gateway
Check Passive Gateway File Download status whether change to  "SUCCESS"
Run SQL "generate_hard_copy_report_print_summary" and check printing status

Perform VALID V Application Health Check *** heed msg "MQ Status check - SUCCESS" on OMI *** 1. Check Address Engine at https://valid5.td.hksarg/valid   □ 2. Check Online Report of Web Server 01 at https://u5pweb01:7011/valid   □ 3. Check Online Report of Web Server 02 at https://u5pweb02:7011/valid   □ 4. To ping IP addresses of ITS UPS at TDOA PC   □

Perform Dedicated Network Application Health Check 1. Check Online Report on A19 in HKLO                  □ 2. Check Address Engine on A19 in HKLO               □ 3. Check Online Report on C11 in KLO                     □ 4. Check Address Engine on C11 in KLO                  □
tasks.Remarks: (Remarks : Re : COPM 17.4 A19 IP address : 172.16.242.102 C11 IP address : 172.16.193.127)
